item.title: How we built a data obfuscation platform that made production data shareable
item.description: How intelligent data obfuscation unlocked collaboration without compromising privacy Companies sit on valuable production data they can’t shareâ€”with vendors, partners, or even internal teams. PII regulations, contractual obligations, and security policies lock data behind approval processes that take weeks. A healthcare company can’t share patient data with an ML vendor. A bank can’t give transaction logs to a fraud detection partner. An e-commerce platform can’t export customer behavior to their analytics consultants.
